GSD.description:
hwmon: (w83793) Fix NULL pointer dereference by removing unnecessary structure field

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.151 by commit 6cb01fe630eaffc5a2c3f7364436caddba286623. For more details please see the references link.
